summary: Provoked, Cleopatra bets Caesar, that she can build a big palace in 3 months. An architect is given 3 months or else.. Fortunately, Getafix/Panoramix, Asterix and Obelix come to Alexandria to help.
cast: Roger Carel|Jacques Morel|Micheline Dax|Jacques Balutin|Jacques Bodoin|Maurice Chevit|Pierre Tornade|Claude Dasset|Pierre Garin|Olivier Hussenot|Bernard Lavalette|Rodolphe Marcilly|Joel Noel|Jean Parédès|Fred Personne|Lucien Raimbourg|Eddy Rasimi|Pierre Trabaud|Lee Payant|Hal Brav|Jean Fontaine|John Prim|Alexandre Klimenko|Anthony Stuart|Edward Marcus|George Birt|Lyle Joyce|George Keros|François Valorbe|Derry Hall|Bruce Johansen|John Rounds|Arch Taylor|Mezz Mezzrow|Yves Brainville|Michael Brown|Patrick O'Hara|Jimmy Shuman|Colin Drake|Steve Waring|Ginger Hall|Paula d'Aba|Walter Bluhm|Otto Czarski|Gérard Darrieu|Ursula Herwig|Hans Hessling|Martin Hirthe|Jacques Jouanneau|Klaus W. Krause|Henri Labussière|Edgar Ott|Serge Sauvion|Siegfried Schürenberg|Patrick Allen|Mel Blanc|René Goscinny
title: Astérix y Cleopatra
